attributes.action: Britain to put pressure on the Turkish government to remove Turkish settlers and the Turkish Military from what should be a free Republic Cyprus - the only country in the world to have its Capital split in half for over 30 years now!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Turkish government do not want to come to the table to resolve the issue of Cyprus as a free and independent state and the British government must step in and take action as the so called guarantor of peace.  The mess that the British government started must now be cleaned.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
